page.title: 01LANDSCAPE OF BRADLEY
page.content:
{Bradley}has more grassland than arable land ,there are five lakes and two bogs or marshes.The{aerodrome}used to be a training base,but now is only used for model aircraft club and private light aircrafts.Most of the {aerodrome}and{Bradley Wood}is scrubland,apart from a field in the centre of the airfield.Most houses in {Bradley}are in two main groups,one round{Bradley School}and the other round{Hadley Lane,}the rest are scattered round the countryside {Bradley}does not have cliffs like {Matlock Bath}but is just rolling scenery.{Bradley}has a good selection and amount of trees.
{Tommy Cowley
